unnormalised:
Ḍeliveri leka ṭhikana e̠m o̠ktore, sāri do̠ PIN ko̠ḍ do̠y do̠ho̠y me!
"10, Park Street, Kolkata" te̠ mo̠d peke̠j kuli o̠ktore, 700016 lekan po̠sṭal ko̠ḍ baṅ le̠khan do̠ baṅ puro̠a.
Ona leka te̠, khali "AIIMS ko̠re, Delhi" do̠ me̠nthe̠n do̠ baṅ puro̠a; puro̠ ṭhikana ar PIN ko̠ḍ samil do̠ho̠y me, jemon "Ansari Nagar, AIIMS, New Delhi, Delhi 110029."
Ape̠n ko̠riyār se̠rvis do̠ che̠nko̠ ba̠kri̠, ona do̠ bar do̠rha ja̠ca̠w me, ar a̠pe̠ do̠ sādharaṇte̠ mo̠d adha ṭhikana boro̠borta̠n te̠ so̠hĩ PIN ko̠ḍ onlaina te̠ pe̠ nam da̠ṛe̠a̠.
normalised: ḍeliveri la-gi eḍres emok khatiŕ, P-I-N koḍ do sabaḱ uṛuj dohoime! "ṭen, Park Isṭriṭ, Kolkaṭa" -te ekṭa pakej pāṭhāu do posṭal koḍ baṅ khan pura baṅ kana, jemon sāt jiro jiro jiro eḱ choy. Ona leka ge, "AIIMS Talare, Delhi" men do baṅ juroḱ-a; pura eḍres ar pin koḍ do bolo dohoime, jemon, "Ansari Nagar, AIIMS, Niu Delhi, Delhi eḱ eḱ jiro jiro duḱ nuḱ." Aapnaḱ kuriar sorbhis do ōkā forameṭ do kaman-a, ona do dō baṛaḱpe, ar ona do jidaḱge sohoj P-I-N koḍ onlain-re ekṭa adha eḍres baṛaḱ khatiŕ ńam daṛeḱaḱ-pe.
text:
Ḍeliveri leka ṭhikana e̠m o̠ktore, sāri do̠ PIN ko̠ḍ do̠y do̠ho̠y me!
"10, Park Street, Kolkata" te̠ mo̠d peke̠j kuli o̠ktore, 700016 lekan po̠sṭal ko̠ḍ baṅ le̠khan do̠ baṅ puro̠a.
Ona leka te̠, khali "AIIMS ko̠re, Delhi" do̠ me̠nthe̠n do̠ baṅ puro̠a; puro̠ ṭhikana ar PIN ko̠ḍ samil do̠ho̠y me, jemon "Ansari Nagar, AIIMS, New Delhi, Delhi 110029."
Ape̠n ko̠riyār se̠rvis do̠ che̠nko̠ ba̠kri̠, ona do̠ bar do̠rha ja̠ca̠w me, ar a̠pe̠ do̠ sādharaṇte̠ mo̠d adha ṭhikana boro̠borta̠n te̠ so̠hĩ PIN ko̠ḍ onlaina te̠ pe̠ nam da̠ṛe̠a̠.
